blogPost.excerpt: The Intricately Assistant sits alongside the Google Chrome browser, automatically displaying real-time cloud data on prospects you and your team research. See your prospects’ cloud footprints, in our most actionable delivery platform yet.
blogPost.body: The Intricately Assistant sits alongside the Google Chrome browser, automatically displaying real-time cloud data on prospects you and your team research. See your prospects’ cloud footprints, in our most actionable delivery platform yet.
blogPost.title: The Intricately Assistant - A new chrome extension to accelerate your sales prospecting
blogPost.author: Sarah E. Brown

localize.description: Intricately Assistant与谷歌Chrome浏览器并驾齐驱，自动显示你和你的团队研究的潜在客户的实时云数据。在我们迄今为止最具可操作性的交付平台上，查看您的潜在客户的云足迹。
localize.tagline: 一个新的chrome扩展，以加快您的销售前景。

localize.description: Intricately Assistant與谷歌Chrome瀏覽器並駕齊驅，自動顯示你和你的團隊研究的潛在客戶的實時雲數據。在我們迄今爲止最具可操作性的交付平臺上，查看您的潛在客戶的雲足跡。
localize.tagline: 一個新的chrome擴展，以加快您的銷售前景。

previous.excerpt: Answer a few questions, and we’ll transform your memories into a tiny, personalised book filled with: ✔️Your responses ✔️Fun facts, including from your home country ✔️Whimsical illustrations It is 100% free and you’ll receive your booklet in under 10 minutes!
previous.title: Time Capsule - Transform your 2020 into a tiny, personalized book for free!

localize.description: 回答几个问题，我们将把你的记忆变成一本小小的、个性化的书，里面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事实，包括来自你的家乡 ✔️奇思妙想的插图 100%免费，你将在10分钟内收到你的小册子!
localize.tagline: 将你的2020年免费改造成一本小小的个性书!

localize.description: 回答幾個問題，我們將把你的記憶變成一本小小的、個性化的書，裏面有 ✔️你的回答 ✔️有趣的事實，包括來自你的家鄉 ✔️奇思妙想的插圖 100%免費，你將在10分鐘內收到你的小冊子!
localize.tagline: 將你的2020年免費改造成一本小小的個性書!

next.excerpt: If you love topic-based learning, this is for you! Organize your learning journey with curations and creations. Share knowledge collections to benefit and discuss with peers. Build your personal brand around your learning portfolio.
next.title: PalPark - Curate and share your learnings by topics

localize.description: 如果你喜欢主题式学习，这就是你的选择! 用策展和创作来组织你的学习之旅。分享知识集锦，与同行共同受益和讨论。围绕你的学习组合建立你的个人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主题策划和分享您的学习成果

localize.description: 如果你喜歡主題式學習，這就是你的選擇! 用策展和創作來組織你的學習之旅。分享知識集錦，與同行共同受益和討論。圍繞你的學習組合建立你的個人品牌。
localize.tagline: 按主題策劃和分享您的學習成果
